newsitem.title: UK: Mexico keeps June crude prices for Europe unchange.
newsitem.headline: Mexico keeps June crude prices for Europe unchange.

text.p: Mexico has left the prices of crude oil for contract customers in Europe unchanged in June, traders said on Friday.
Maya crude for June lifting will be priced at a discount of $2.50 a barrel to the Petroleos Mexicanos (Pemex) price formula.
Isthmus crude will be priced at the Pemex formula less 86 cents a barrel, traders said.

Mexico also left the price of Maya crude unchanged for customers in the Far East in June but cut the price they will have to pay for Isthmus by 10 cents a barrel to the average of Oman and Dubai quotations plus 40 cents, Japanese traders said on Friday.
Details of prices for U.S. customers were not immediately available.
